articles.title: Police fire tear gas as anti-restrictions "Freedom Convoy" enters Paris - Reuters
articles.description: A protest convoy breached police defences and drove into central Paris on Saturday, snarling traffic around the Arc de Triomphe and on the Champs Elysees, as police fired tear gas at demonstrators protesting against COVID-19 restrictions.
